eduversum.name: Scribus
eduversum.description:
Scribus is a Desktop-Publishing-Program. It can be used for creating professional layouts and it is comparable with Adobe PageMaker, QuarkXpress or Adobe InDesign. In contrast to these proprietary programs is Scribus free software and licensed under the GNU GPL.\n\n
Scribus supports a multitude of functions which are needed for professional DTP. These include color management, color separation with CMYK, PDFs with the PDF/X-3 standard, PDF-Import, tables and vector drawings. Scribus also offers extensive PDF functionality like creation of PDF presentations and PDF forms.
